text: [Music]
there's a lot of mud when it rains here
and it makes it really hard to find food
there car bombs every day my mom worries
about me when I go out every time I hear
that alarm bell go off in school I think
it's an air raid sometimes I have
nightmares about it a lot of houses in
our neighborhood have been destroyed I'd
like to close my ears and sing songs
whenever the bombs kind of close my dad
says we have to leave what makes be
scared I'm worried our new neighbors
won't like us what if they don't
understand your religion because we
don't speak the language it might be her
dreaming to make friends but I know it's
all going to be okay it's all gonna be
racing I just want my family to be safe
but these are not my words not my word
these are not my words
you
